name: TikTok
title: tiktok.com
shortDescription: TikTok is a global video-sharing social networking service where users can create, share, and discover short videos. The platform is designed for the everyday user to showcase their creativity through singing, dancing, comedy, and more. An example use case is a brand promoting its products through creative video content to engage with a younger audience.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: YouTube
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Larger video lengths and diverse content

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Instagram
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong focus on visuals and stories
